xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/696109-A Glitch in the Matrix 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/bn0BLVadmvzq6MmJ0n97MLxGpNQ.jpg Are we in fact living in a simulation? This is the question postulated, wrestled with, and ultimately argued for through archival footage, compelling interviews with real people shrouded in digital avatars, and a collection of cases from some of our most iconoclastic figures in contemporary culture. A Glitch in the Matrix
